author: bayard
msg: An attempt to put together an implementation for bugzilla issue 29163. Tempted to think that split() should not be using the stopTime variable.

author: bayard
msg: cleaning up some bad maven configuration. A <resource> tag is needed between the resources and includes to work. As it no longer works, I have removed the sections as they appear to not need them (copy and paste from original poms in commons). Also removed empty jar tags and integrationTest tags
